title: We Count
subtle: Factual Description (nonfiction), 51 words, Level C (Grade K), Lexile 50L
description: We Count offers students the opportunity to count by ones and tens to 100 using pictures of spiders, slugs, and various types of insects. Illustrations and repetitive text support students as they read. (Note: Bugs is a generic term that is often used to refer to various types of insects. Spiders are referred to as arachnids and slugs are mollusks.)
reviewWords: count, crickets, fleas, grubs, slugs, ten
grammar: Capitalization                : Recognize and understand the use of capital letters at the beginning of a sentence
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Identify, write, and correctly use high-frequency words I and you
